moves.name: Gyro Ball
moves.effect: Its power is doubled if the target’s Speed has risen.

moves.name: Zen Headbutt
moves.effect: Has a small chance of making the target flinch.

moves.name: Analysis Complete!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Defense and Sp. Def. Makes the user resistant to the type of the last move it was hit by.

moves.name: Telekinesis
moves.effect: Makes the target unable to evade moves.

syncMove.name: Post-analysis Flash Cannon
syncMove.description: Its power increases if the target is flinching.

passives.name: Aggravation 1
passives.description: Raises the chance of inflicting the flinching, confused, or trapped condition with the additional effects of moves.
